general: After a brief period of hibernation, Libras are reborn with a renewed thirst for success. The Moon in Cancer highlights your aspirations, urging you to work towards fulfilling your desires. Be attentive to opportunities to showcase your leadership abilities, whether by supporting your colleagues, managing conflicts, or honing your skills. With so many activities underway, do not forget to eat well and stay hydrated, as time can pass very quickly. Professional competition intensifies as the Moon, Jupiter, Mercury, and Venus form unbalanced connections, so it is crucial to defend your position if others attempt to overshadow you.
love: Take the time to listen to your partner's needs.
work: Showcase your talents and do not let anyone make you doubt your abilities.
health: Remember to take regular breaks to recharge.
advice: Stay focused on your goals, you are on the right path.
